summary: Bat file that unlocks all perks in the Alchemy & Enchant skill trees
descriptionHtml:
Long story short, I was messing around and -voila!- this terrible thing came into existence. ... Actually, it's quite useful, IMO, especially if you're hella lazy like I am but you also like enchanting stuff and brewing poisons and stuff like that. This bat file includes EVERY SINGLE PERK aside from Purity, which is completely pointless, honestly - half the time you're concocting somthing, it's for septims and skill, not what the effects are. So, here is my first (and probably only) upload to the Nexus. Hope you find it as useful as I have!

X,
Blotchy
author: Blotchy
